sources.name: Movies
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies

sinks.name: Output
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		Tomato,
		NewRating
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['movies.csv']) ~> Output

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Movies select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		Tomato = {Rotton Tomato}
	))~> Select1
